com.ibm.cuda

Class CudaException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.ibm.cuda.CudaException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class CudaException
extends Exception
    The CudaException class represents an unusual or unexpected response from a CUDA-capable device.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
